elementSpec.desc: describes the identifiable speakers, voices, or other participants in a linguistic interaction.
언어적 상호작용에서 식별가능한 화자, 음성, 또는 기타 참여자를 기술한다.
描述在一個語言互動中可辨識的說話者、聲音或其他參與者。
言語交流における，特定可能な発話者，声，その他の参加者を示す．
décrit les locuteurs, voix ou autres participants identifiables d'une interaction linguistique.
describe los hablantes identificables, voces u otros participantes de una interacción lingüística.
descrive parlanti, voci o altri parlanti identificabili in una interazione linguistica.

person.p: Female informant, well-educated, born in Shropshire UK, 12 Jan 1950, of unknown occupation. Speaks French fluently. Socio-Economic status B2.

exemplum.p: This example shows both a very simple person description, and a very detailed one, using some of the more specialised elements from the module for Names and Dates.

remarks.p: May contain a prose description organized as paragraphs, or a structured list of persons and person groups, with an optional formal specification of any relationships amongst them.
Peut contenir un texte organisé en paragraphes, ou une liste structurée de personnes, de groupes de personne, avec des spécifications formelles facultatives des rapports qui les unit.
段落としてある散文の解説または，関連性の形式定義を選択的に持つ，人 物やグループの構造化リストが示されるかもしれない．
